name: Side Squad
description:
The circles have attacked! It's up to you to stop them! You can choose three different shapes, each will give you different stats depending on how much sides the shape has.

This was made for the BlackThornProd  #3 game jam. The theme was "Less is more".

I did not make the music. I got the music from opengameart.org. The font is  LCD solid

In the Tutorial, it says "right click to shoot", this is a typo, it's actually left click.

A little note: after you complete all the waves, you have to wait another 10 secs before the game knows you have won, I can't fix this because of my spaghetti code :/

I don't know why the letters in web version are completely black, guess it's a feature now.
